root.name: They
root.description: OverviewThey was announced quietly during E3 2007, and has since been under development. The developer, Metropolis, was expected to release They some time in 2010, although they have now missed this . The game's story is very unique involving alien creatures that mind control machines and cyborgs, who have invaded a terrorist-ridden England, and its said that the terrorists will also play a role in this mystery sci-fi plot. features one weapon that has hundreds and thousands of combinations of parts that the player can pick up. Therefore the weapon can become a laser mini-gun to a napalm cannon. It can be fitted with scopes, different barrels and different types of ammo and firing mechanisms. You can also paint your weapon. If it is ever released, They is going to use DirectX 10 and will be running on an in-house engine.
